# Resomi
Small, upright, raptor-like creatures with four ears and feathered tails. They are very lightweight and can be picked up and carried by other species.
## Mobility Their small size allows them to move [color=#1e90ff]2.5x faster in zero-gravity[/color] environments.
## Combat Their unarmed claw attacks deal Slash damage instead of Blunt. These attacks deal [color=red]5[/color] points of Slash damage.
## Sounds Resomi make sounds akin to common bird noises found on Earth, such as chirping, trilling, screeching, calling, and squawking.
